description:
Various customers come to visit Honda Bookseller`s. So many people, so many minds, each with their own color, and each with their own book.
There Daimon and his men in black suddenly appear, buying up all of Akiyama Shinobu and Himehagi Momiji`s books.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Dog by Chance Is Preordained
Inu Furiau no mo Tashou no En
犬振り合うのも多生の縁
